韢字的基本解释

韢
suì
扎口袋的皮绳。
古代盛敌人首级的口袋。

韢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuì］
［《廣韻》此芮切，去祭，清。］
(1)古时盛敌人首级的口袋。
(2)指用口袋盛敌人首级。

韢字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韢； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1395第19
【唐韻】【集韻】?胡計切，音系。【說文】橐紐也。从韋惠聲。又【說文】一曰盛頭橐也。【註】徐鍇曰：謂戰伐以盛首級。【集韻】盛馘囊。　又【集韻】胡桂切，音慧。又【廣韻】楚稅切【集韻】此芮切，?音毳。義?同。【集韻】或作?。　又【集韻】徐醉切，音遂。囊紐也。又一曰盛虎頭囊。或作?。

韢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
韢字的起名意思

暂无。

Ying
Basic explanation of words
Ying
suì
Leather rope to tie the pocket.
The pocket of the head of the ancient Sheng enemy.
Ying
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cuì］
["Guangyun" This Ruiqie, go to sacrifice, Qing. ]
(1) The pocket of the enemy's head in ancient times.
(2) Refers to using pockets to hold the enemy's head.
Ying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji] [Wei Zi Department] 　韢; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1395 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Hu Jiqie, phonology. [Said the text] Li Niu also. From Wei Huisheng. [Said the text] Yi said Shengtou also. [Note] Xu Kai said: It is said that the battle is the first level to Sheng. 【Ji Yun】Sheng Feng Nang.　[Jiyun] Hu Guiqie, Yinhui. [Guangyun] Chu Shuiqie [Jiyun] This Ruiqie,? Yinshu. Righteous? Same. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Jiyun] Xu Zuiqie again, and the sound is complete. Nang Niu also. Another said Shenghutou capsule. Or for?.
